detectors.description:
Andre.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andre__1.sol#19-26) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balanceOf[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andre__1.sol#22)
	- balanceOf[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andre__1.sol#23)
detectors.markdown:

	- [balanceOf[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andre__1.sol#L23)

detectors.description:
Andre.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andre__1.sol#41-53) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balanceOf[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andre__1.sol#48)
	- balanceOf[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andre__1.sol#49)
	- allowance[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Andre__1.sol#50)
